positive.review:
it is good, i love the atmosphere but it has some downsides.
-the events are confusing, it is fun and adds some difference to the gameplay but WHERE THE F??CK DO YOU WANT ME TO FIND A KEY IN A BIG AHH CITY?
-the grind very, VERY hard. not that hard but you have to figure out how to eat, drink, how to pick a lock, how to craft a lockpick, how to NOT break a lockpick kinda things.
-loot density is really low. like theres a whole ass building and it has just ONE box with scraps in it.
-also PLEASE fix this: near rafik's stores entrance there are 2 boxes. go behind them and ur stuck forever.
it is a good but long and repetitive game
In this game you will be drinking bodka with some random rushian and fighting gigant monsters and ppl that want to pvp. love this game
It is a free version of fallout. You get what you pay for.
coming back year after year to start all over again feels great
intresting mmorpg
great fun
cool fun game
good
The grind is real   why do i torture myself   ::)
ok
Game is good but it sucks because of community cant even level up peacfully if there is max level guy beating everybody that walks into his proximity.

Subject: [BUG/Query] Issue with ammo change function
Message:
Hello, development team.
I'm writing because I've returned to the game after some time away and have noticed a change or a possible bug in the gameplay.
Previously, the default key for changing ammo type was the X key. This function was very useful, and although it didn't appear in the control settings menu, it was a default game action.
Currently, this function seems to be inoperative. When I press the X key, nothing happens.
I would like to know if this functionality has been intentionally removed in a recent update, if it has been reassigned to another key, or if this is an unintentional error (bug). I would greatly appreciate any clarification you can provide on this.
Thank you very much for your attention.
Best regards.
The game is really fun for the most parts the only part where its boring is at the start and not to say that you can play this game for 200 hours and still not compleate it

Game is really cool, reminds me of a game called Stalcraft. The game has good atmosphere and good Russian language voice acting. The PVP in this game is a bit unfair if you are a low level player. graphics are really good in this game. But gameplay gets boring because of similiar missions where you have to find some resources and bring it back to base without getting killed. Achievements in this game are almost impossible to do.

it is good, i love the atmosphere but it has some downsides.
-the events are confusing, it is fun and adds some difference to the gameplay but WHERE THE F??CK DO YOU WANT ME TO FIND A KEY IN A BIG AHH CITY?
-the grind very, VERY hard. not that hard but you have to figure out how to eat, drink, how to pick a lock, how to craft a lockpick, how to NOT break a lockpick kinda things.
-loot density is really low. like theres a whole ass building and it has just ONE box with scraps in it.
-also PLEASE fix this: near rafik's stores entrance there are 2 boxes. go behind them and ur stuck forever.
it is a good but long and repetitive game
Very interesting. Needs lots of cleanup but the game is a lot of fun if you're patient. I recommend you give it a shot
In this game you will be drinking bodka with some random rushian and fighting gigant monsters and ppl that want to pvp. love this game

Game is good has a little bugs here and there. If, you like quest and exploring this feels more like an older version of fallout games with a mix of tarkov. since when you die in pvp someone else can loot you. The is a great size smaller than dayZ but still a good size to explore. you make the most money outside the safe zone. once you leave its better to be with a group of friends than being alone. unless you love the thrill of going alone. more power to you. game has levels to unlock more weapons. Don't expect to much from a free game. i Give the game a solid 6/10. The game also has pve mode in case you want to just enjoy the exploration aspect of the game. you will see ton of players in the safe zone. who are friendly. so the game is not dead. i feel like its still good from what i have played.

[h1] Will To Live Online [/h1] 

This game is one of the most unique MMOs survival post apocalyptic video games very closer to S.T.A.L.K.E.R games .  READ BELOW  PLEASE !!! 

[h3]Development[/h3] :  The development , updates and content are slow but are amazing.
 
[h3]Community[/h3] :  The community is mixed , some are good , kind and helpful , they give a purpose and motivation play this game. It is very interesting because you play together with other players which is the best.  There is another group of the community which is toxic , no-life type because they are simply bored. These people destroy the climate of the community and guess what , THEY LEAVE the game !! 

[h2] What's the problem ? [/h2] 

The problem about this game is the Guidelines and lack of Information in-game , players do not understand how to get started in the game , they dont understand the rules and there is not a lot of support based actual situations happening in-game.  Report system is not the best and customer support is not helpful. 


[h3] Recommendations for the developer team [/h3]

[b] Community [/b] 
The game content is very good , slow but very good enjoyable and well suited for such game. The rules and system of the that is connected with community. It needs balance and the main interest is mixed which means the Audience are looking for something compatitive but also with rules that apply for everyone. 

[b] Reporting / Violations / EULA [/b] 
The game has a lack of strict rules which will limit player abuse with psychology and verbal abuse to players such as : sexism , racism , body image , cheating , toxic behaviour. Reporting system in-game is broke up to the point players  need to report manually from discord server or VK ( russian facebook) support mail .  The problem comes from the mass reports from players which some are just not actual reports and some are reports of real cheaters in the game. 

-  Filtering the reports dynamically.  ID tracing technology which can identifies the violator. 
-  Discord Rules with moderators and stuff 
-  Updated Guidelines which will support everybody ( race , beliefs , anything) 

I recommend it to try the game out but it lacks of rules that protect players with different interests in the game.
Nice game, coming back after a couple of years
It is a free version of fallout. You get what you pay for.
coming back year after year to start all over again feels great
Peak game abit of of a grind but good overall
intresting mmorpg
great fun
cool fun game

The grind is real   why do i torture myself   ::)
Best game!

I would like to know if this functionality has been intentionally removed in a recent update, if it has been reassigned to another key, or if this is an unintentional error (bug). I would greatly appreciate any clarification you can provide on this.

The PVP in this game is a bit unfair if you are a low level player. graphics are really good in this game. -the grind very, VERY hard. not that hard but you have to figure out how to eat, drink, how to pick a lock, how to craft a lockpick, how to NOT break a lockpick kinda things.

Game is good has a little bugs here and there. If, you like quest and exploring this feels more like an older version of fallout games with a mix of tarkov. since when you die in pvp someone else can loot you. The is a great size smaller than dayZ but still a good size to explore. you make the most money outside the safe zone. once you leave its better to be with a group of friends than being alone. unless you love the thrill of going alone. more power to you. game has levels to unlock more weapons. Don't expect to much from a free game. i Give the game a solid 6/10. The game also has pve mode in case you want to just enjoy the exploration aspect of the game. you will see ton of players in the safe zone. who are friendly. so the game is not dead. i feel like its still good from what i have played.

negative.review:
this game is total garbage. it has a nice atmosphere, the survival, the hunting and the cooking aspects are cool. but everything lacks depth. that is not really bad, but the frustration that the game brings predominates the fun for me.

it lacks content, not enough things to explore, not many weapons and no incentive to progress in the game. the translation to German is so bad, often times I dont understand what the objective is. there are many mechanisms that are not explained at all and you have to find everything out by yourself through the internet. you´ll die many times over and over again without even knowing why. some type of anomally but there is no warning, you die and you spawn at the last map traverse that you passed, and then you have to walk for another 10 minutes to get your loot back that you have lost. 
to me, this game is really frustrating, it could be nice, with more weapons, more content and specifically more structure. well, at the end of the day, it is free and I totally understand why. I would have been really mad if I had spent money on this.

the game it self is kinda inrtesting but everything is very slow and with each level is unbelivebly hard they should make it a bit more playable instead of wasting time by walking for decades from place to place
game doesn't give you access to better weapons at lower levels and consistent  lag and freezing

It’s an interesting setting and it reminds me of Stalker, which isn’t a bad thing.  It is nice to see games like this stepping away from the overdone cliché zombie apocalypse.  Just like Fallen Angel: Hell Survival proved that even a myth and magic setting works with this genre.  They don’t always have to be about forests and zombies. 
 
The world is ok and atmospheric.  The graphics are ok, but the character models and animations are a bit janky. 

The user interface is good and easy to get used to. 

Starting out is a bit perplexing, especially with the initial panic of how to keep fed and watered.  It really sucks and doesn’t make sense that you can’t sell raw chicken meat and eggs to the barman, but he haply accepts raw rat meat. Hmph??  You’d think he would want it to cook the chicken and sell on, but no.  This would be a nice little thing to be able to do, especially early game to help afford to keep fed and watered easier.  

The quick select number keys to change weapons didn’t work for me half the time.  

The combat seems to be very hit and miss and highly effected by lag spikes.  There was one time I just could not hit a rat at all, but it had no issues attacking and killing me.  I don’t know if that was lag or a bug, but it was a huge put off.  Could be a netcode issue.  Having read some other negative reviews it looks others have had similar issues, so could be a netcode issue and my ping was decent.  I certainly don’t have issues with all multiplayer games, especially when the ping seems to be ok.  I would like to suggest to the devs to create an offline single player option.  Some of us prefer playing these games solo anyway. 

The quests are your typical dull fetch quests you get in MMORPG’s.  So if you like that sort of thing, you may like this, but not me.  I’d rather have no quests at all and just sandbox it, like in Minecraft and Fallen Angel: Hell Survival.  

I think this game needs a lot of work.  Maybe I will return to it at a later date and see how it’s going, since it’s in early access, there’s a chance it could improve greatly over time.   I can see this having the potential to be better than 7 Days to Die, which btw imo has only gotten worse over the years.  All the devs need to do is maybe get the netcode fixed or just give up and make it singleplayer and improve the combat and I would probably already prefer it.

this game isnt even in english, unless you want to hear someone babbling shit while you READ ENGLISH TEXT. if you say its in english, MAKE IT TRUE. I didnt get past the first part because i found this to be VERY distracting, and annoying

Yeah great game. I guess that's why there's never more than like a 4% load on the server... Fucking idiots give you no armor then send you out to shit that attacks you with no running noise or visual. The "watcher" enemies don't even seem to be there until after they're already attacking you. Another game with potential if it wasn't Ruski dog shit.

Boring Day Z clone why is it bad?

Stamina runs out in 3 second sprint/walking sim

Worst loot spawns than day Z/non-existent 

Enemies are to hard
Too many cheaters, all for donations
yleobaaaa amis dedas sheveci magari grafikebi ki aqvs mara imena siri tamashia tan rusulia da magenis dedas calke sheveci
Just no

to me, this game is really frustrating, it could be nice, with more weapons, more content and specifically more structure. well, at the end of the day, it is free and I totally understand why. I would have been really mad if I had spent money on this.

Starting out is a bit perplexing, especially with the initial panic of how to keep fed and watered.  It really sucks and doesn’t make sense that you can’t sell raw chicken meat and eggs to the barman, but he haply accepts raw rat meat. Hmph??  You’d think he would want it to cook the chicken and sell on, but no.  This would be a nice little thing to be able to do, especially early game to help afford to keep fed and watered easier.  

The quick select number keys to change weapons didn’t work for me half the time.  

The combat seems to be very hit and miss and highly effected by lag spikes.  There was one time I just could not hit a rat at all, but it had no issues attacking and killing me.  I don’t know if that was lag or a bug, but it was a huge put off.  Could be a netcode issue.  Having read some other negative reviews it looks others have had similar issues, so could be a netcode issue and my ping was decent.  I certainly don’t have issues with all multiplayer games, especially when the ping seems to be ok.  I would like to suggest to the devs to create an offline single player option.  Some of us prefer playing these games solo anyway. 

The quests are your typical dull fetch quests you get in MMORPG’s.  So if you like that sort of thing, you may like this, but not me.  I’d rather have no quests at all and just sandbox it, like in Minecraft and Fallen Angel: Hell Survival.  

I think this game needs a lot of work.  Maybe I will return to it at a later date and see how it’s going, since it’s in early access, there’s a chance it could improve greatly over time.   I can see this having the potential to be better than 7 Days to Die, which btw imo has only gotten worse over the years.  All the devs need to do is maybe get the netcode fixed or just give up and make it singleplayer and improve the combat and I would probably already prefer it.

this game isnt even in english, unless you want to hear someone babbling shit while you READ ENGLISH TEXT. if you say its in english, MAKE IT TRUE. I didnt get past the first part because i found this to be VERY distracting, and annoying

Yeah great game. I guess that's why there's never more than like a 4% load on the server... Fucking idiots give you no armor then send you out to shit that attacks you with no running noise or visual. The "watcher" enemies don't even seem to be there until after they're already attacking you. Another game with potential if it wasn't Ruski dog shit.

Boring Day Z clone why is it bad?

Stamina runs out in 3 second sprint/walking sim

Worst loot spawns than day Z/non-existent 

Enemies are to hard
Too many cheaters, all for donations
yleobaaaa amis dedas sheveci magari grafikebi ki aqvs mara imena siri tamashia tan rusulia da magenis dedas calke sheveci
Just no

this game is total garbage. it has a nice atmosphere, the survival, the hunting and the cooking aspects are cool. but everything lacks depth. that is not really bad, but the frustration that the game brings predominates the fun for me.

it lacks content, not enough things to explore, not many weapons and no incentive to progress in the game. the translation to German is so bad, often times I dont understand what the objective is. there are many mechanisms that are not explained at all and you have to find everything out by yourself through the internet. you´ll die many times over and over again without even knowing why. some type of anomally but there is no warning, you die and you spawn at the last map traverse that you passed, and then you have to walk for another 10 minutes to get your loot back that you have lost. 
to me, this game is really frustrating, it could be nice, with more weapons, more content and specifically more structure. well, at the end of the day, it is free and I totally understand why. I would have been really mad if I had spent money on this.

the game it self is kinda inrtesting but everything is very slow and with each level is unbelivebly hard they should make it a bit more playable instead of wasting time by walking for decades from place to place
game doesn't give you access to better weapons at lower levels and consistent  lag and freezing

Just like Fallen Angel: Hell Survival proved that even a myth and magic setting works with this genre.  They don’t always have to be about forests and zombies.

I don’t know if that was lag or a bug, but it was a huge put off.  Could be a netcode issue.  Having read some other negative reviews it looks others have had similar issues, so could be a netcode issue and my ping was decent.  I certainly don’t have issues with all multiplayer games, especially when the ping seems to be ok.  I would like to suggest to the devs to create an offline single player option.  Some of us prefer playing these games solo anyway.

All the devs need to do is maybe get the netcode fixed or just give up and make it singleplayer and improve the combat and I would probably already prefer it.

The world is ok and atmospheric.  The graphics are ok, but the character models and animations are a bit janky. 

The user interface is good and easy to get used to. 

Starting out is a bit perplexing, especially with the initial panic of how to keep fed and watered.  It really sucks and doesn’t make sense that you can’t sell raw chicken meat and eggs to the barman, but he haply accepts raw rat meat. Hmph??  You’d think he would want it to cook the chicken and sell on, but no.  This would be a nice little thing to be able to do, especially early game to help afford to keep fed and watered easier.  

The quick select number keys to change weapons didn’t work for me half the time.  

The combat seems to be very hit and miss and highly effected by lag spikes.  There was one time I just could not hit a rat at all, but it had no issues attacking and killing me.  I don’t know if that was lag or a bug, but it was a huge put off.  Could be a netcode issue.  Having read some other negative reviews it looks others have had similar issues, so could be a netcode issue and my ping was decent.  I certainly don’t have issues with all multiplayer games, especially when the ping seems to be ok.  I would like to suggest to the devs to create an offline single player option.  Some of us prefer playing these games solo anyway. 

The quests are your typical dull fetch quests you get in MMORPG’s.  So if you like that sort of thing, you may like this, but not me.  I’d rather have no quests at all and just sandbox it, like in Minecraft and Fallen Angel: Hell Survival.  

I think this game needs a lot of work.  Maybe I will return to it at a later date and see how it’s going, since it’s in early access, there’s a chance it could improve greatly over time.   I can see this having the potential to be better than 7 Days to Die, which btw imo has only gotten worse over the years.  All the devs need to do is maybe get the netcode fixed or just give up and make it singleplayer and improve the combat and I would probably already prefer it.
